About Me

Let me tell you a few things about me...

BIO

I am a web developer with a background in project management. I was fascinated by software development while working as a project manager in the engineering sector that programming is a great tool to resolve business issues. Since then, I joined a Bootcamp and have been learning and building websites and apps. I enjoy learning new things, and as a developer, I believe learning will never end for me.

Graduated Web Development Bootcamp

I graduated from a web development Bootcamp at Lighthouse Labs. During the Bootcamp, I learned the most recent coding technologies, including JavaScript(ES6+), HTML5, CSS3, React JS, Node JS, Express, Ruby, SQL, Mocha & Chai, Jest, and Cypress, as well as developed several projects. I continued learning such as TypeScript, Data Structure, Algorithms, etc.

Project Management Professional (PMP)
Professional Scrum Master (PSM)

As a PMP, I have extensive knowledge of waterfall and agile project management methods along with a decade of field experience in eleven different countries. Recently, I obtained Professional Scrum Master certificate to be specialized in software development processes and environments
